{{video game infobox
| image = Heroes of Middle-earth.jpg

| name=The Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle-earth

'''''The Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle-earth''''' is a collectable RPG video game developed by Capital Games and produced by [[Electronic Arts]] for iOS and Android devices. It is based on [[The Hobbit]] and [[The Lord of the Rings|The Lord of the Rings books]]. The game was released on [[10 May]] of [[2023]].<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://mobilematters.gg/gaming/lotr-heroes-of-middle-earth-release-date-pre-registration-gameplay|articlename= The LOTR: Heroes Of Middle-Earth: Release Date, Pre-Registration, Gameplay|dated=14-September-2022|website=[https://mobilematters.gg/ MobileMatters]|accessed=03-October-2022}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.engadget.com/lord-of-the-rings-heroes-of-middle-earth-arrives-may-10th-160018567.html?guccounter=1&guce_referrer=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZ29vZ2xlLmdyLw&guce_referrer_sig=AQAAAFCfVJ41p2eqBeCW9L-cmNBHR_6vn17soYwn_O4DoSxhTjbO55bozk5gSQ0WwYBiBDvvNq7YLhrMt92vyfy4ZN1oFqmO4N4WJDNieOg3rQf5qL9oXFmG-t9zV3tjLIRonvRFVEL6I8AfN8UELyQRKr-4-ZeQB83gEC2bst_r0lSt|articlename= 'Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle-earth' arrives May 10th|dated=7-April-2023|website=[https://www.engadget.com/ Engadget]|accessed=13-April-2023}}</ref>

On [[24 February]] of [[2024]], it was announced that the game will no longer become available for use generally on [[24 May]] of the same year.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.ea.com/games/lord-of-the-rings/the-lord-of-the-rings-heroes-of-middle-earth/news/an-important-update|articlename= An Important Update|dated=24-February-2024|website=[https://www.ea.com/games/lord-of-the-rings/the-lord-of-the-rings-heroes-of-middle-earth The Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle-earth]|accessed=13-April-2024}}</ref>

==Plot==
The game explores an original, never-before-told story. It features immersive storytelling, turn-based combat, deep collection systems, and a wide roster of characters based from both The Lord of The Rings and The Hobbit, and it is set during the [[War of the Ring]].<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.livemint.com/technology/tech-news/lord-of-the-rings-heroes-of-middle-earth-gets-release-date-check-details-11681112814623.html|articlename= Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle-earth gets release date. check details|website=[https://www.livemint.com/ livemint.com]|dated=2023-04-24|accessed=10-May-2023}}</ref>
